import React, { useState } from 'react' import RTCMultiConnection from 'rtcmulticonnection' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { useRouteMatch } from 'react-router' import { Form, Button, Row, Col, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import { reducer } from 'lodash' function StudentPage() { const history = useHistory() const match = useRouteMatch() console.log('history', history) console.log('match', match) let roomId = match?.params?.uuid || 1 console.log('roomId', roomId) const [show, setShow] = useState(true) const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: '', camera: true, micro: false }) const handleChangeUser = (name, value) => { setUser(prevTags => { return { ...prevTags, [name]: value } }) } const handleClose = () => setShow(false) // const handleShow = () => setShow(true) const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const connection = new RTCMultiConnection() console.log('object', connection) connection.socketURL = 'https://rtcmulticonnection.herokuapp.com:443/' connection.session = { audio: true, video: true } connection.sdpConstraints.mandatory = { OfferToReceiveAudio: true, OfferToReceiveVideo: true, } roomId = connection.token() connection.openOrJoin(roomId) handleClose() return false } console.log('user',user) return (
JOIN CLASS ROOM
handleSubmit(event)}> Name handleChangeUser('name', event.target.value)} />
Camera handleChangeUser('camera', true)} /> handleChangeUser('camera', false)} />
Micro handleChangeUser('micro', true)} /> handleChangeUser('micro', false)} />

Student
) } export default StudentPage
